news

General updates of my study, research and publications.

Jul 1, 2021 new Published journal paper as a co-author titled “Feasibility and Acceptability of a mHealth Self-Management Intervention for Pediatric Transplant Families” in Western Journal of Nursing Research, 2021.
May 28, 2021 new Published journal paper as a co-author titled “One Size Does Not Fit All: Discharge Teaching and Child Challenging Behaviors” in Western Journal of Nursing Research, 2021.
Apr 26, 2021 Invited talk on "Introduction to Causal Inference" (slides) for COSC 5931/4931 Machine Learning Principles, Spring 2021 at Marquette University.
Apr 23, 2021 Peer reviewer for “AMIA 2021”.
Mar 26, 2021 Member of Program Committee for “COMPSAC 2021”.
Mar 19, 2021 Awarded the Computer Science Summer Research Fellowship (CSSRF) for Summer 2021 at Marquette University.
Mar 3, 2021 Peer reviewer for “Workshop on Machine Learning for Preventing and Combating Pandemics” in ICLR 2021.
Mar 1, 2021 Member of Program Committee for “UAI 2021”.
Dec 7, 2020 Student volunteer for “NeurIPS 2020”.
Nov 27, 2020 Peer reviewer for “Workshop on Trustworthy AI for Healthcare” in AAAI 2021.
Nov 5, 2020 Presented poster on ““Is Haloperidol effective in Delirium treatment?”: Answering Treatment and Policy Controversies in Healthcare through Prior Knowledge-driven Structural Causal Model Generation” in Forward Thinking Poster Session 2020 at Marquette University.
Aug 7, 2020 Published conference paper titled “A Causally Formulated Hazard Ratio Estimation through Backdoor Adjustment on Structural Causal Model”, presented in Machine Learning for Healthcare 2020.
May 29, 2020 Passed Ph.D. qualifiying exam and completed Ph.D. proposal defense.
May 6, 2020 Peer reviewer for “AMIA 2020”.
May 5, 2020 Published journal paper as a co-author titled “Using the engaging parents in education for discharge (ePED) iPad application to improve parent discharge experience” in Journal of Pediatric Nursing, Volume 52, 2020.
May 1, 2020 Completed Master of Science in Computing (Specialization: Big Data and Data Analysis) from Deprtment of Computer Science, Marquette University.
Feb 27, 2020 Published journal paper as a co-author titled “Pilot study protocol of a mHealth self‐management intervention for family members of pediatric transplant recipients” in Research in Nursing & Health, Volume 43, Issue 2, 2020.
Dec 3, 2019 Presented poster on “Causal Exploration on Large Healthcare Datasets through Emulation of Randomized Controlled Trials: An Application on Delirium Patients in the ICU” in Forward Thinking Poster Session 2019 at Marquette University.
Nov 4, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster titled “MARQUECare: A Model Palliative Care System for Everyone” in A Celebration of Research in the Klingler College of Arts & Sciences 2019 at Marquette University.
Sep 27, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster titled “MARQUECare: Information Technology Tools and a System for Palliative Care for Everyone”, presented in Healthy People on a Healthy Planet Conference, Milwaukee, WI.
Sep 26, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster titled “mTEH: A Decision Support System for Tele-ophthalmology to Improve Eye Health of Wisconsin Population in Community Settings”, presented in the 4th IEEE/ACM Conference on Connected Health (CHASE), Washington, D.C.
Aug 19, 2019 Shifted from Department of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science to Department of Computer Science. Started Ph.D. in Computer Science, changing from Ph.D. in Computational Sciences.
Aug 16, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster on “mHealth family self-management intervention for parents of transplanted children: Preliminary results”, presented in 14th International Family Nursing Association Annual Meeting, Washington, D.C.
Jul 15, 2019 Published conference paper as a corresponding author titled “Towards Predicting Risky Behavior among Veterans with PTSD by Analyzing Gesture Patterns”, presented in IEEE 43rd Annual Computer Software and Applications Conference (COMPSAC 2019), Milwaukee, WI.
Jul 15, 2019 Published conference paper as a corresponding author titled “Analyzing Happiness: Investigation on Happy Moments using a Bag-of-words Approach and Related Ethical Discussions”, presented in IEEE 43rd Annual Computer Software and Applications Conference (COMPSAC 2019), Milwaukee, WI.
May 22, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster on “Outcomes of Use of Antipsychotic for Delirium in the ICU: A Big Data Approach”, presented in American Thoracic Society 2019 International Conference, Dallas, TX.
May 20, 2019 Started working as Visiting Scholar (Summer Research Intern) at Regenstrief Center for Healthcare Engineering, Purdue University, IN.
May 19, 2019 Worked as co-author in a poster on “E-BAP: A scalable and flexible web-based software system to support self-management for behavior changes”, presented in IEEE International Conference on Biomedical and Health Informatics (BHI’19), Chicago, IL.
May 2, 2019 Attended the workshop “IRSA Conference: Causal Inference and Data Science” at University of Minnesota, MN.
Apr 25, 2019 Attended the conference “AAAI 2019 Spring Symposium Series”, specifically the WHY19 symposium “Beyond Curve Fitting — Causation, Counterfactuals and Imagination-Based AI” at Stanford University, Palo Alto, CA.

Oct 5, 2018 Attended workshop on “Machine Learning 4 Medical Imaging (ML4MI)” at University of Wisconsin-Madison.
Sep 13, 2018 Worked as Co-author in a poster on “Getting Started: mHealth family self-management intervention for parents of transplanted children”, presented in Studies of Pediatric Liver Transplantation Annual Meeting. Atlanta, GA.

Apr 26, 2018 Presented poster on “Survey Management and Image Grading Software System for Automated Detection of Diabetic Retinopathy to Improve Eye Health in the Milwaukee Community” in Community Engagement Conference at Medical College of Wisconsin, Milwaukee.
